fdd:FDD.titleName: Expert Witness Disk Image, ASR SMART

fdd:identificationAndDescription.fdd:fullName: Expert Witness Compression Format, ASR SMART

fdd:description.p: Version of the EWF bitstream image format from ASR Data (SMART brand), generally similar to the description offered in EWF_Family.

fdd:identificationAndDescription.fdd:shortDescription: First version of the EWF bitstream image format from ASR Data (SMART brand).
fdd:identificationAndDescription.fdd:productionPhase: Typically used for data analysis and not part of a process to create new content. May be used to archive data.

fdd:sustainabilityFactors.fdd:disclosure: Fully documented. Proprietary format developed by ASR Data. Documentation freely available; formerly on the ASR Data Web site (http://www.asrdata.com/SMART/whitepaper.html), now available at the Internet Archive. Same documentation also available on Simson Garfinkel's Forensics Wiki.
fdd:sustainabilityFactors.fdd:documentation: Internet Archive copy at various URLs, including https://web.archive.org/web/20070202102106/http://www.asrdata.com/SMART/whitepaper.html; Forensics Wiki version at http://forensicswiki.org/wiki/ASR_Data%27s_Expert_Witness_Compression_Format
fdd:sustainabilityFactors.fdd:adoption: Not investigated at this time. In archives (as distinct from legal and law enforcement settings), where tools like Bit Curator and FTK Imager are in wide use, user comments suggest that EWF_E01 and AFF (description forthcoming) are most frequently employed.

fdd:filenameExtension.fdd:note: Filename extensions for the first 99 content segments are .s01, .s02, through .s99; followed by .saa, .sab, and so on.
